briefTitle: Open-label Extension (OLE) Study to Assess Safety and Efficacy of Evolocumab
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Open-label Extension (OLE) Study to Assess the Long-term Safety and Efficacy of Evolocumab
summary: The purpose of this study was to characterize the safety and tolerability of long-term administration of evolocumab in adults with known coronary artery disease and hypercholesterolemia.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Adverse Events
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From first dose of evolocumab up to 30 days after the last dose, or end of study, whichever was earlier, up to 108 weeks.
